quoteText: If You are under the minimum age of consent to enter into a contract in Your jurisdiction, then You may not use or access the Services at any time or in any manner.  For example, in the United States, You must be at least 13 years of age to establish an account and use the Service and You must be at least 18 years old to purchase and sell items through the Service.
title: This service is only available to users of the minimum age of consent and up

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users of a certain age
tosdr.tldr:
Under "ACKNOWLEDGMENT AND ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS OF SERVICE" it states that: 
"If You are under the minimum age of consent to enter into a contract in Your jurisdiction, then You may not use or access the Services at any time or in any manner.  For example, in the United States, You must be at least 13 years of age to establish an account and use the Service and You must be at least 18 years old to purchase and sell items through the Service."
